caption: Figure 1: SeerAttention uses a learning-based approach to exploit attention sparsity of LLMs, applicable in both post-training and fine-tuning stages. By incorporating SeerAttention with YaRN (Peng et al., 2024) to extend a Llama-3-8B model from 8k to 32k context length, the loss curves for 50% to 90% sparsity are nearly identical to the dense YaRN baseline (a); For test perplexity, 50% sparsity achieves near-lossless performance, and even at 90% sparsity, the loss remains minimal (b); SeerAttention achieves up to 5.67x inference speedup at 90% sparsity over FlashAttention-2 (Dao, 2023);
description: Figure 1 shows the results of SeerAttention on Llama-3-8B model, demonstrating near-lossless performance with high sparsity in both fine-tuning and post-training, along with significant speedup over FlashAttention-2.
